name: Devin M. Zeyher
body:
![](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10206299012666838&set=a.1480602387665.60926.1611967142&type=3&theater)This is Devin. He is a Junior CIS: Information Systems major at Mansfield University of Pennsylvania, located in Mansfield, PA. He is hoping to use his degree to get a job in which he will always be learning and furthering his knowledge.

Technology & Programming Skills:
•	Programming Experience- Java, JavaScript, Junit Testing, HTML, Linux, Vim, Agile, Scrum, Software Version Control, Git, GitHub, Bootstrap Web Framework, CSS, SQL, MySQL database administration, MySQL Workbench, Linux System Administration, Java JDBC database programming, and Eclipse IDE
•	Software Experience- Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Microsoft Applications (Powerpoint, Word, Excel, Access)
•	Operating System Experience- iOS, Android, Windows

Devin has been involved with several programming projects in his time here at Mansfield University. Most of these projects have been working in groups and relying on people to keep their word and do their part. When leadership is needed, Devin can stand up and take that position.
